    Compress

    When true, and only a single bone is being constrained, if the target is too close, the bone is scaled to reach it.

    Declaration
    public bool Compress { get; set; }
    Property Value
    Type Description
    Boolean
    | Improve this Doc View Source

    Mix

    A percentage (0-1) that controls the mix between the constraint and unconstrained rotations.

    Declaration
    public float Mix { get; set; }
    Property Value
    Type Description
    Single
    | Improve this Doc View Source

    Softness

    For two bone IK, the distance from the maximum reach of the bones that rotation will slow.

    Declaration
    public float Softness { get; set; }
    Property Value
    Type Description
    Single
    | Improve this Doc View Source

    Stretch

    When true, if the target is out of range, the parent bone is scaled on the X axis to reach it. If the bone has local nonuniform scale, stretching is not applied.

    Declaration
    public bool Stretch { get; set; }
    Property Value
    Type Description
    Boolean
    | Improve this Doc View Source

    Target

    The bone that is the IK target.

    Declaration
    public BoneData Target { get; set; }
    Property Value
    Type Description
    BoneData
    | Improve this Doc View Source

    Uniform

    When true, only a single bone is being constrained and Compress or Stretch is used, the bone is scaled both on the X and Y axes.

    Declaration
    public bool Uniform { get; set; }
    Property Value
    Type Description
    Boolean
